snippet.title: Harder Mario Bros. Meltdown - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Here:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/h50taiiwdam5wy88219mi/AGV6eI2ATWGSTtOQyz1rNao?rlkey=zh0etzhbrcvf19k42mofi7du3&st=z6x1sbzy&dl=0

Join The Meltdown Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/GYTpEWbzu5

GameBanana:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/580519

Happy Mar10 Day! Here's the release of Harder Mario Bros. Meltdown to celebrate.

Harder Mario Bros. Meltdown is a fully realised re-imagining of my 2019 hack, Harder Super Mario Bros. Wii. It's a full game hack that edits all of the levels to make them much, much harder. Except this time it's even harder than before! A lot of the time in this hack it will genuinely just feel like you're playing some Mario Maker kaizo levels designed by a nerd with too much free time (that's me).

Can you survive as the Mushroom Kingdom heats up? Or will you struggle and meltdown?
